FuncDef:
The description command sets the description of the current tunnel policy.
The undo description command deletes the description of the current tunnel policy.
By default, no description is configured for the tunnel policy.

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates the description of a tunnel-policy.
The value is a string of 1 to 80 case-sensitive characters, with spaces supported.

Examples: [*HUAWEI-tunnel-policy-test1] description two TE tunnels are used
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After the tunnel-policy command is run to create a tunnel policy, run the description command to configure a description for the tunnel policy to facilitate later tunnel policy checking.
